lead_paragraph: PRICE--Robert. The Board of Directors, residents and staff of The Hebrew Home at Riverdale deeply mourn the loss of Robert Price. Bob was a great New Yorker, a true patriot and an ardent Zionist. He was a devoted friend to The Hebrew Home at Riverdale and took particular interest in our Weinberg elder abuse prevention program. We will miss his keen intellect, wit and insight. We extend our heartfelt condolences to the Price, Farbman and Holzman families. May they be comforted among the mourners of Zion. Daniel Reingold, President & CEO The Hebrew Home at Riverdale 1/3
